About Me

“ Be a Creative Front End developer. ”

Who I am?

My name is Cuong, with a special passion for Front End Developer.
I created this website with the purpose of sharing my knowledge and passion for everyone.
My target is to become a creative front end, why? Because I want to directly develop ideas with my creativity, I do not want to be limited in thinking and only following the design and marketing teams.
If you also like Front End, we will prove to the fucking developers who think FE is simple and easy that FE is an art.

*For more information, please take a look at
